trends: There have been 18 other sightings in New Port Richey
There were no other sightings in New Port Richey on or around May 29th 2010
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 10:30 pm on saturday 5\29\10 my husband and i took the dog outside before going in to bed. i usually look at the sky since i have seen several unidentified objects in the past. sometimes i will take my night vision monocular outside with me. using the night vision scope i am able to see stars and satellites that are not normally seen with the naked eye. this night i ran back inside to get the scope since the sky was so clear. my husband had taken the dog inside and i stayed outdoors to search the skies for anything of interest. it didn't take long before an object caught my eye. i was looking almost straight up toward the northeast with the scope when i saw an object that appeared to be extremely high up moving slowly to the northeast. i was unable to see this object without the use of the night vision scope and it was about the size and shape of the dimmer stars that are also only visible through the scope. i noticed this object would be dim for approx. 4-5 seconds and then would brighten somewhat slowly (it did not flash quickly on and off) staying bright for only a second or so and would then slowly dim again appearing like the background stars for another 4-5 seconds. this process would repeat over and over for the duration of the sighting, never wavering. i tried to see if the object was visible without the scope but was never able to see it even when it brightened unless i used the scope. when i first saw the object i assumed right away it was just another satellite until i noticed that it was moving much, much slower than the other satellites that i have seen. then when the brightening and dimming was noticed i knew for sure it could not be a satellite. i became very anxious and excited when i realized i could not identify this object. eventually, i lost sight of it. because i had been watching the object almost directly above me, my neck had been hurting pretty bad. i had been taking small breaks to rest my aching neck, keeping the scope in the direction of the object all the while. after about 4 minutes of watching the object, when i went back to look at it, it was gone. i searched the vicinity in which it had been traveling and i was no longer able to see it. if it had kept moving at the same pace, i should have been able to see it being there was nothing to block my view. after looking for the object for another 3 minutes i gave up. there was no way for me to gauge the size or altitude of this object given that it was only visible through the scope although, i believe it was in space and not within the earth's atmosphere. there were both small, private aircraft and commercial airliners in the sky at the same time as this object and the differences were obvious. this was definitely not an airplane. i reported this sighting to nuforc the next day but when i saw the mufon report from lehigh acres that resembled what i had seen, i felt it necessary to report it here as well. it always helps to know that you may not have been the lone witness to an event like this.
Summary: Object would brighten then dim repeatedly.
